com.plexobject.service

Interface IncomingInterceptorsLifecycle

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InterceptorsLifecycle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InterceptorLifecycleImpl, ServiceRegistry

    public interface IncomingInterceptorsLifecycle
    This interface allows adding/removing interceptors for input

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInputInterceptor(Interceptor<java.lang.String> interceptor)
      This method adds interceptor for raw JSON/XML input before it's decoded into object
      void addRequestInterceptor(Interceptor<Request<java.lang.Object>> interceptor)
      This method adds interceptor, which is invoked before passing request is passed to handler
      java.util.Collection<Interceptor<java.lang.String>> getInputInterceptors()
      This method returns interceptors for raw JSON/XML input before it's decoded into object
      java.util.Collection<Interceptor<Request<java.lang.Object>>> getRequestInterceptors()
      This method returns request interceptors, which is invoked before passing request is passed to handler
      boolean hasInputInterceptors()
      This method returns true if input interceptors exist
      boolean hasRequestInterceptors()
      This method returns true if request interceptors exist
      boolean removeInputInterceptor(Interceptor<java.lang.String> interceptor)
      This method remove interceptor for raw JSON/XML input before it's decoded into object
      boolean removeRequestInterceptor(Interceptor<Request<java.lang.Object>> interceptor)
      This method removes interceptor, which is invoked before passing request is passed to handler
